script_name: 查看Linux系统CPU和内存使用Top 5进程
script:
#!/bin/bash
# Description:  Get Linux CPU Mem Usage Top 5

# Get Data/Time
CTIME=$(date "+%Y-%m-%d %H-%M-%S")

# CPU
echo -e "\033[33m---------------- $CTIME CPU Usage Top 5 ----------------\033[0m"
ps -aux | sort -k3nr | head -5

# Mem
echo -e "\033[33m---------------- $CTIME Mem Usage Top 5 ----------------\033[0m"
ps -aux | sort -k4nr | head -5
